name: Garindan Ezz Zavor
description: With his face hidden beneath his dark hood, goggles and insect-eating snout, few know Garindan's origins. He was seen carrying the Model 434 blaster pistol, popular among bounty hunters and mercenaries.

name: Han Solo
description: Han Solo, known only as Han until being given the surname Solo by an Imperial recruitment officer, and formerly known as Cadet 124-329 while serving as an Imperial cadet, is a human male smuggler.

name: Zam Wesell
description: Zam Wesell is a rogue Clawdite female bounty hunter. She possess the ability to physically alter her appearanceâ€”a power which she used to assume the visage of a human female.

name: Bossk
description: Bossk'wassak'Cradossk, known more commonly as Bossk, is a male Trandoshan known for hunting Wookiees. While Bossk often wields a mortar gun, he is also skilled in unarmed combat.

name: The Child
description: Grogu was is male Force-sensitive Mandalorian. Don't let his appearance fool you. Grogu is able to harness the mystical energies of the Force on account of being Force-sensitive.

name: Salacious B. Crumb
description: Salacious B. Crumb is a Kowakian monkey-lizard who works as a jester in the court of the crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure. According to the mole-flea Lugubrious Mote, Salacious is 'dumber than a newborn rancor.'
